input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cone Christmas Garland with Warm LED Lights (2-Pack'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Snowy Bristle Pine Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Ohe Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='72" Lighted Decorated Christmas Pine Garland with Timer The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Melrose International 5' Pine Garland Set of 2'
  - Name='Frontgate Noble Pine Magnolia Pre Lit Christmas Holiday Tree Garland'
  - Name='Frontgate Battery Operated Garland'
  - Name='6 ft. Endless Evergreen Frontgate Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Frontgate 6 ft. Indigo Berry Greenery Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 14" Pre-Lit White Alaskan Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White'
  - Name='Frontgate Faux Green Pine 4 Ft Christmas Garlands with Lights Battery'
  - Name='Coen 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with Gold Berries, Balls, Pine Cones, and'
  - Name='9 ft. Red Magnolia Frontgate Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Celestial Lights 12' x 14" Pre-Lit Woodland Berry Artificial Christmas Garland with LED Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 72'' Lighted Green and Gold Christmas Balls and Pinecorn Pre-Decorated Christmas Pine'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Snowy Bristle Pine Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and pre-lit with clear lights, pine garland with bristle needles; does not specify LED or battery operated, slightly less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Ohe Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit faux pine garland but length and light details unspecified; relevant but less closely matched.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 72" Lighted Decorated Christmas Pine Garland with Timer The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted pine garland with timer feature but shorter length (6 ft) and unspecified light type; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Melrose International 5' Pine Garland Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pine garland but shorter length (5 ft), no mention of lighting or decoration; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate Noble Pine Magnolia Pre Lit Christmas Holiday Tree Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine and magnolia garland, similar use, but different decorative elements and brand.
Battery operated pre-lit garland but lacking details on pine type or length; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Endless Evergreen Frontgate Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Christmas garland but shorter length and unspecified lighting/pre-lit status; less similar to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate 6 ft. Indigo Berry Greenery Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter garland with berry greenery focus, no mention of pine or lights; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 14" Pre-Lit White Alaskan Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length, pre-lit with warm white lights, pine garland though a different fir type (Alaskan Pine), highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Frontgate Faux Green Pine 4 Ft Christmas Garlands with Lights Battery
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter pine garland with lights and battery operation, but shorter length diminishes similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Coen 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with Gold Berries, Balls, Pine Cones, and
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length pre-lit garland with pine cones and additional decorations, similar functional use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 ft. Red Magnolia Frontgate Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Length matches but red magnolia focus and unclear if pre-lit or pine-based, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Celestial Lights 12' x 14" Pre-Lit Woodland Berry Artificial Christmas Garland with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit with LED lights but longer length and different woodland berry decoration rather than pine; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 72'' Lighted Green and Gold Christmas Balls and Pinecorn Pre-Decorated Christmas Pine
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorter (6 ft) decorated and lighted pine garland, relevant but smaller and different decorations.
